jobDescription: A 19-year old innovator who loves to experiment with code
aboutText: Hi there! I'm Aarnav Sanghvi, a 19-year old innovator and software engineer. I'm passionate about using code to create solutions to complex problems, and I love to experiment with the latest technologies. I'm proficient in NextJS, tailwind, and python, and I'm always looking for new challenges. When I'm not coding, you can find me listening to horror podcasts, hiking in the woods, or reading a good book. I'm always combining my professional and personal experiences to come up with creative solutions. If you're looking for someone who is tech-savvy, creative, and always up for a challenge, I'm your guy!

projects.name: MessagingApp
projects.desc: A project that contains a server, as well as a client application for two clients to chat via tcp
